name: arrival-process
description: Modeling arrival processes of events in a system.

scripts.is_formatted: find . -name '*.js' | grep -v node_modules | grep -v coverage | xargs jscs --preset=google
scripts.is_linted: find . -name '*.js' | grep -v node_modules | grep -v coverage | xargs eslint

author: Hassy Veldstra <h@artillery.io>
